navigation_overview: The website has a sidebar menu on the left after login. Public pages: Login, Register, Forgot Password. Authenticated pages accessible from sidebar: Accounts Overview, Transfer Funds, Bill Pay, Find Transactions, Update Contact Info, Request Loan.

modules.title: Login
modules.description:
The login page allows users to authenticate to the system.

UI Elements:
- Username input field (required)
- Password input field (required)
- Log In button
- Register link
- Forgot login info link

Validation:
- Both fields are required
- Invalid credentials show error message 'The username and password could not be verified.'
- Successful login redirects to accounts overview page

modules.title: Forgot Password
modules.description:
Password recovery page.

UI Elements:
- First Name input (required)
- Last Name input (required)
- Address input (required)
- City input (required)
- State input (required)
- Zip Code input (required)
- SSN input (required)
- Find My Login Info button

Validation:
- All fields required
- SSN must match existing customer record
- On success, displays username and password

modules.title: Register
modules.description:
New user registration form.

UI Elements:
- First Name (required)
- Last Name (required)
- Address (required)
- City (required)
- State (required)
- Zip Code (required)
- Phone (optional)
- SSN (required)
- Username (required)
- Password (required)
- Confirm password (required)
- Register button

Validation:
- All required fields must be filled
- Password must match confirm password
- Username must be unique in the system
- SSN format validation

modules.title: Accounts Overview
modules.description:
Dashboard showing all accounts.

UI Elements:
- Table displaying accounts with columns: Account, Balance, Available Amount
- Each account number is a clickable link
- Total balance displayed at bottom

Behavior:
- Shows all accounts belonging to logged-in user
- Clicking account number navigates to account details
- Balance shows current balance
- Available amount may differ due to pending transactions

modules.title: Transfer Funds
modules.description:
Transfer money between accounts.

UI Elements:
- Amount input field (required, must be numeric)
- From Account dropdown (required, shows user's accounts)
- To Account dropdown (required, shows user's accounts)
- Transfer button

Business Rules:
- Cannot transfer to the same account
- Amount must be a positive number
- Must have sufficient balance in source account
- Transfer confirmation message shown on success
- Transaction appears in both account histories

modules.title: Bill Pay
modules.description:
Pay bills to payees.

UI Elements:
- Payee Name input (required)
- Address input (required)
- City input (required)
- State input (required)
- Zip Code input (required)
- Phone input (optional)
- Account Number input (required, payee's account)
- Verify Account input (required, must match Account Number)
- Amount input (required, numeric)
- From Account dropdown (required)
- Send Payment button

Validation:
- Account numbers must match
- Amount must be positive
- Sufficient balance required
- Success message confirms payment details

modules.title: Find Transactions
modules.description:
Search for transactions in an account.

UI Elements:
- Select Account dropdown
- Find by Transaction ID section with input and Find button
- Find by Date section with date input and Find button
- Find by Date Range section with From/To date inputs and Find button
- Find by Amount section with amount input and Find button
- Find by Amount Range section with min/max inputs and Find button
- Results table showing matching transactions

Behavior:
- Only one search criteria can be used at a time
- Results display transaction details
- Date format should be MM-DD-YYYY
- Amount searches find exact or range matches

modules.title: Update Contact Info
modules.description:
Update user profile information.

UI Elements:
- First Name input (required, pre-filled)
- Last Name input (required, pre-filled)
- Address input (required, pre-filled)
- City input (required, pre-filled)
- State input (required, pre-filled)
- Zip Code input (required, pre-filled)
- Phone input (optional, pre-filled)
- Update Profile button

Behavior:
- Form pre-populated with current user data
- All required fields must remain filled
- Success message confirms update

modules.title: Request Loan
modules.description:
Apply for a new loan.

UI Elements:
- Loan Amount input (required, numeric)
- Down Payment input (required, numeric)
- From Account dropdown (required, for down payment)
- Apply Now button

Business Rules:
- Loan approval based on available funds and debt-to-income
- Down payment deducted from selected account
- If approved, new loan account created
- Results page shows approval status, new account number if approved
